short_summary: High Vacuum Cool Magnetron Sputter and Carbon Coating System
description: This contract includes the delivery of  High Vacuum Cool Magnetron Sputter and Carbon Coating System
full_summary:
# High Vacuum Cool Magnetron Sputter and Carbon Coating System Tender

## Details of the Tender

Tender details are as follows:
- **Reference Number**: cb-641-53930480
- **Solicitation Number**: W8486-249248/B
- **Amendment Number**: 4
- **Publication Date**: 2024-05-08
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-06-21T14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-06-17
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-08-31
- **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)

## Procurement Information

This is a competitive procurement with a LOWEST PRICE selection criterion. The procurement is open to all qualified suppliers.

## Goods Description

The High Vacuum Cool Magnetron Sputter and Carbon Coating System is a technical equipment required by the Quality Engineering Test Establishment (QETE) for failure and accident investigations. The system consists of a high vacuum magnétron sputter deposition chamber surrounded by control and analysis systems.

## Delivery and Option Considerations

The goods must be delivered to QETE Supply Warehouse, NPB Building, 45 Blvd Sacré Coeur, Room C1113, Ramp 7, Gatineau, QC, J8X 1C6. Five additional 1-year option periods are included in the contract for extended maintenance and support services.
